title: Liverpool cruise to dominant 3-0 victory over Manchester United at Anfield
aiSummary: Arne Slot's side delivered a commanding performance with goals from Salah, Mac Allister, and Gakpo as United had no answer at Anfield.

title: Liverpool closing in on Bundesliga centre-back for January transfer window

title: Academy starlet promoted to first-team training after impressive U21 run
